# TopEdge AI Website Documentation

## Site Overview
TopEdge AI provides AI-powered business automation solutions including chatbots, voice agents, and process automation tools.

## Key Products & Services
- AI Voice Agents for customer calls
- Intelligent Chatbots
- Business Process Automation
- Analytics Dashboard

## Target Keywords
- AI caller
- AI chatbot
- business automation
- customer service AI
- TopEdge AI

## Site Structure
- Home: Overview of services
- Products: Detailed product information
- Pricing: Service plans and costs
- Contact: Get in touch
- Blog: Industry insights and updates

## Content Guidelines
- Focus on business automation and AI solutions
- Highlight benefits and ROI
- Include case studies and testimonials
- Regular blog updates on AI technology
